description: React component for displaying and managing playlist details, including tracks list, add/remove tracks, and delete playlist functionality.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches playlist data from backend and updates state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes the playlist after user confirmation.

methods.name: onAddTrack
methods.description: Adds a new track to the playlist using provided track ID.

methods.name: onRemoveTrack
methods.description: Removes a track from the playlist by track ID.
